data.eml:eml: Synopsis of the genus Pharaonus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae), with descriptions of new taxa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Keith, Denis, Sabatinelli, Guido, Uliana, Marco (2015): Synopsis of the genus Pharaonus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae), with descriptions of new taxa. Zootaxa 4012 (1): 167-180, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.1.9
